alert.note: Alert for Clay (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Clay County through 815 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deweese, or 24 miles southeast of Hastings, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairfield around 740 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clay Center, Harvard and Saronville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
